your charts this number may vary between 1 large chart and a couple borders or two small charts rule of thumb is on average the leg chart section of your pet s stocking is about 32 row 8 row for your pet s name optional and 25 row for the designs obviously you may customize this length to your desire after you have finished your leg charts choose 1 foot chart work until the leg of the stocking measures approximately 8 inches setting up afterthought heel continue to work next row in pat until 15 sts before marker like us on facebook www facebook com/simplyserving1 visit our shop at simplyserving etsy com drop working yarn s and grab a length of scrap yarn knit across next 30 sts 15 before marker 15 after with scrap yarn turn work and slip all scrap stitches back onto your left needle purlwise pick up working yarn for current continue in pattern right over your scrap yarn row you will remove this later to insert the heel continue working your foot chart for another 2 ½ to 3 inches break yarn and change to toe color using toe color yarn transfer your sts onto 3 dpns as such from marker 15 30 15 work 2 row total in new color begin decreasing every other row needle 1 k to last 2 sts k2 decrease needle 2 ssk k to last to sts k2tog needle 3 ssk k to end continue until 28 sts remain combine needle 1 and needle 3 sts so that you now have only two needles facing each other use kitchener stitch to graft sts together picking up your heel using a tapestry needle carefully pluck out the piece of scrap yarn and slip stitches onto dpns being careful not to drop or unravel
